code: import{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{auth,db}from"../firebase";import{createUserWithEmailAndPassword,updateProfile}from"firebase/auth";import{doc,setDoc,serverTimestamp}from"firebase/firestore";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Register(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[senha,setSenha]=useState("");const[nome,setNome]=useState("");const[sobrenome,setSobrenome]=useState("");const[nascimento,setNascimento]=useState("");const[msg,setMsg]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();async function handleRegister(e){e.preventDefault();setMsg("");try{const cred=await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,senha);await updateProfile(cred.user,{displayName:"".concat(nome," ").concat(sobrenome)});await setDoc(doc(db,"users",cred.user.uid),{uid:cred.user.uid,email:email.trim().toLowerCase(),firstName:nome.trim(),lastName:sobrenome.trim(),birthDate:nascimento,createdAt:serverTimestamp()});setMsg("Cadastro ok! Vá fazer login.");setTimeout(()=>navigate("/"),900);}catch(err){if(err.code==="auth/email-already-in-use")setMsg("E-mail já está em uso.");else if(err.code==="auth/weak-password")setMsg("Senha fraca (mín. 6).");else setMsg("Erro ao cadastrar.");}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Login"})," | ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Cadastro"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Cadastro"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form",onSubmit:handleRegister,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"E-mail",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Senha",value:senha,onChange:e=>setSenha(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Nome",value:nome,onChange:e=>setNome(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Sobrenome",value:sobrenome,onChange:e=>setSobrenome(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",placeholder:"Data de nascimento",value:nascimento,onChange:e=>setNascimento(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Cadastrar"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mensagem",children:msg})]});}
